And all the angels of heaven will say: "Amen".

note.p: As the selection of miracles and the passages of the ʾAkkonu bǝʾǝsi indicates, the initial intention of the scribe (or creator of the archetype) was to produce a compilation of two works: the Täʾamrä Maryam wä-Iyäsus (cp. Witakowski 1995:281, cp. Uppsala O Etiop 15). However, it was dropped already in the beginning of the work; apart from the strophes of the hymn, only 3 miracles of Jesus were included, two in the beginning and one in the end.

msItem.note: The miracles of Text I-4a are partly numbered (number 27 was given twice).
